A

a - Variable in class starvationevasion.common.Tuple
 
a - Variable in class starvationevasion.sim.SeaLevel
fields a, b and c are used to store the coefficients of the quadratic equation y = ax2 + bx + c which for x=year, gives y=Mean Annual Sea Level in cm above the ZERO_YEAR level.

ActionButtons - Class in starvationevasion.client.GUIOrig.DraftLayout
ActionButtons are the GUIOrig element which are responsible for allowing the user to tell the server that they're done with drafting, if the want to undo a move, or if they want to discard up to 3 cards

addEnactingRegion(EnumRegion) - Method in class starvationevasion.common.PolicyCard
The Server is responsible for verifying and setting each enacting region of all policy cards requiring a vote (votesRequired() > 0).

Each policy sent to the simulator must be enacted by at least one US region.

approvedRegionBits - Variable in class starvationevasion.common.PolicyCard
This is a bitwise int with a 1 in the position corresponding to each region that has approved the policy (EnumRegion.getBit()).
Note: This field is ignored for all automatic policy cards.
Note: The player who owns a policy always has an automatic approve vote.
